page.title: 08HOME AND SCHOOL.
page.content: Living in a small village like Barnsley has its advantages and disadvantages. Being a teenager, I like to go out with my friends. This is sometimes difficult as I have to rely on my parents for a lift. My brother, however, enjoys living here because he can make ' dens' and ride his bicycle safely. I go to school in Cirencester. I catch a school bus to and from the school which I don't have to pay for because Barnsley is over five miles from the school.I am in the fifth year and the subjects I chose to take are: Biology, Chemistry, Physics, German, French and Latin. We all have to do English, Maths and P.E. I do roughly one and a half hours' homework a night as well as the five hours' lessons at school.I would like to go to University to study Law.
